answers.answer: It has the sound of impetigo,this is an infection that can be caught by a graze or wound becoming infected, it can also spread to surrounding areas,oral anti biotics should take care of it also an antibiotic cream.Ir is possible it didnt clear last time, make sure his socks are clean at all times.in fact I would cover the area with a gauze dressing with the anti biotic cream on .,when It looks like it is clearing, take the dressing off as the air will dry it up ..ask the Doctor if it is Impetigo ..good luck.

title: My 10 Year old son
